Room.Name: Grand Stairway Landing
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the landing of the grand stairway in the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: Below you is the foyer and the registration desk for the inn, and looking north you see the vestibule at the main entrance. Above you is a hallway going to the west. The carpet beneath your feet is a deep, dark, wine red plush and matches the beautiful velvet draperies on the wall. A polished mahogany rail runs around the landing, and a locked closet door is in the south wall.
